title: Payments API outage
description: After a deploy, the payments API returned 502 errors and was unavailable for 18 minutes.

title: Latency spike on batch processing
description: Overnight jobs slowed with sustained latency and timeouts after a traffic spike.

title: Public bucket near-miss
description: Security scan flagged a public bucket containing internal reports; access revoked before download.

title: Credential leak alert near-miss
description: Monitoring detected exposed credentials in a build log; tokens rotated before misuse.

title: Scheduler disk full

title: Data restore failed
description: Backup restore failed during a routine test, requiring recovery steps.
